scripts.deploy: sam build --region us-east-1 && sam package --template-file template.yml --s3-bucket $npm_package_config_bucketName --output-template-file packaged.yaml && sam deploy --region us-east-1 --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name $npm_package_config_stackName --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM && aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name $npm_package_config_stackName --region us-east-1 --query 'Stacks[].Outputs'
